source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: How To Draw Hands

visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: Master drawing a difficult subject with an easy set of ideas.
objectives_summary: Learn easy solutions for drawing a difficult subject
How to simplify the hand into three parts
How to use simple shapes and forms to draw each hand element

items.title: Home Décor - Learn Fine Art Skills with Warli (Folk) Art
items.headline: Make a colourful folk art with detailed cone work and acrylic paints to decorate your home
objectives_summary: Canvas Preparation
Ceramic Cone Preparation
Fine Art - Cone Work

items.title: Teach Yourself To Machine Quilt Free Motion Feathers

visible_instructors.name: Sally
visible_instructors.job_title: Machine Quilting Author & Educator for Long Arm & Domestic
visible_instructors.title: Sally Terry

items.headline: Know That You Can Do This With Our Techniques
objectives_summary: Learn using a progressive skill building course without the overwhelm.
Get dozens of coordinated feathered block, sashing, border and fill designs.
Stitch detailed feathering designs without marking as you go.

items.title: 3D hand painting course for beginner to advanced
items.headline: Art，drawing，3D painting
objectives_summary: Understand the fundamental principles of art
Draw lifelike paintings
Draw an object from beginning to end

items.title: Everything Resin Art Beginner to Intermediate Masterclass
items.headline: Learn Everything Resin Art
objectives_summary: Everything Resin Art Beginner to Intermediate Masterclass

7 modules covering  1. Safety when working with resin 2. Tools & equipment  3. Types of Resin 4. Dirty Pour 5. Direct Pour  6. Swipe Method  7. Double Layering & Creating Cells  In-depth Everything Resin Series Masterclass

items.title: Learn Oil Painting - Paint-a-long
items.headline: Milky Way over the Beach
objectives_summary: Learn to create a night scene landscape painting featuring the ocean waves and beach.
Create a milky way/galaxy
Gain a knowledge in oil painting and the many supplies it comes with

items.title: Easy still life oil painting
items.headline: Simple approach to mastering the media
objectives_summary: Simple approach to still life oil painting. Including composition tips, colour mixing, painting from scratch to detail.

items.title: Color Theory 101 for the Beginner Acrylic Painter
items.headline: How to mix colors with acrylic paints plus full tutorial, 'Tree of Many Colors' with Skye
objectives_summary: The basics of color theory
How to mix colors with acrylic paints
Art vocabulary: Hues, tints, tones and shades

items.title: Beginners Wire Jewellery Workshop
items.headline: Learn to make your own Jewellery projects with step by step video  tutorials and downloadable worksheets
objectives_summary: You will learn to make your own findings like Jump rings, wires, links, pins, Links with beads, wrapped beads closing headpins, wrapped pins and spirals.
Tips and tricks to make your work easier and more precise with 12 individual Tips videos included.
You will learn about different beads and how to add them to your pieces to create beautiful effects with downloadable support files

items.title: Soap Making Course: Make Beautiful Artisan Soaps at Home
items.headline: Learn to make luxurious handmade soap to pamper & impress your customers and know the science behind soap making
objectives_summary: Know the types of soap that are currently available in the market
Gain the full list of ingredients needed to manufacture soap
Understand how to make soap from minimal equipment and tools

items.title: Learn How to Draw Koalas and Pandas Step by Step
items.headline: You'll learn how to draw these AMAZING wild animals by following Colin's easy step by step videos.
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw Koalas and Pandas
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Start Oil painting seascape, sky, clouds & flying bird
items.headline: How to start oil painting and creating realistic seascape, sea waves, sky clouds and a flying seagull with every detail
objectives_summary: How to start oil painting
How to prepare canvas for painting
What are different types of brushes and what are their uses and how to clean them.

items.title: Hydrangea Study in Watercolour
items.headline: Steps to a Beautiful Floral Painting
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to bring colour, and techniques together to create a watercolour of flowering hydrangea.
Are you intimidated to sketch? No worries you will be shown how to transfer any photo onto your paper!
The study of the delicate flower petal and leaf shape will guide you for negative painting.

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Summer fields - Landscape

visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova

items.headline: We learn how to paint the  Summer fields Landscape step-by-step!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, glazing
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Plant Drawings and Illustrations in Garden Design
items.headline: For a Garden Plan or Garden Design Schemes
objectives_summary: You will improve your drawing skills, enhance your design skills and learn new techniques to improve your knowledge in art and design

items.title: Palette knife - Painting a realistic rose impasto from basic

visible_instructors.name: Julia
visible_instructors.title: Julia Grechkina
visible_instructors.job_title: Palette knife artist. Impasto technique for the beginners.

items.headline: Easy steps to paint with a palette knife. Basic of impasto technique from basic to complex
objectives_summary: Oil painting
Oil impasto
Palette knife technique
